特記事項: 【合併】Introduction to The World of English（総合政策学部）/英語文化論（総合政策学部）
授業方法:
The format of this course is lecture style with a large amount of personal activity.
All fourteen classes will be face-to-face format.

第1回: How many words do you need to know?
第2回: In the beginning: A brief history of the capital letter
第4回: Like, the word like is like, awesome
第8回: Around and around they go: Those shifty vowels
第11回: Practice makes perfect: Frequency and the phrase
第13回: Heavy words: The weight of a clause
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will be required to learn and remember the ten new vocabulary words for each lecture. They will be tested on their ability to remember and use the vocabulary.
